column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////This place is always amazing. The only reason they don't have 5 stars is because there is always a 2 hour wait. Now
column2: it IS worth the wait and long waits mean good food
column3: so I get it. What can they do? When I'm hungry I wanna eat now
column5: but again-people keep going and the food is to die for so they obviously know what they're doing.
